Authors: list of authors
Title: article title
substudy_identifyer: numbered substudies that include a type of default nudge
udc: observed target behavior subject to undesirable default condition
acc: observed target behavior subject to active choice condition
ddc: observed target behavior subject to desirable default condition
direction: desired change in target behavior (increase or decrease)
significance: significance level of DDC-intervention (0=not significant, 1=10%-level, 2=5% lev
disclosure: 1=intention to influence is disclosed with default, 0=if not
purpo: intervention purpose has social goal vs. solely pro decision-maker goals 0=socia
quality: overall score on quaility checklist (Downs and Black 1998)
